DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare educational efficacy instructional design enhancements on-line learning module context clinical medical education .
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve medical student seven US medical school participate trial two WISE-MD computer-based learning module . Students randomize 1 4 study arm . The 4 content-equivalent condition : screen shot voiceover interactivity ; learner control pace multi-media content ; social networking feature ; social networking feature plus user interface enhancement .
DOC.criteria: All thirdyear medical student 7 collaborating school ( N= 2308 ) rotate surgery clerkship July 2009 September 2011 . Students consent participate decide withdraw participation .
